Presbyterian Giving Catalog

The Presbyterian Giving Catalog is a resource created by the Presbyterian Church (U.S.A.) to give congregants an opportunity to donate and provide gifts to those in need around the world. While at nimblejack, I was tasked with giving the home page of the online giving catalog a refresher.

The existing page looked like this:

Old site

I brought in new images and created a new set of icons for the different categories of gifts (Aid Kits, Livestock, Agriculture, Water, and People). Through checking analytics, I saw that the "How It Works" page was rarely visited, so I brought that section into the home page to prevent an extra click/leaving the site.
